term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - reaction cross-section, σ_r
term.title: reaction cross-section

item.text: A quantity used in collision theories of reactions in order to interpret calculated or experimental rates. In some collision theories the reaction cross-section is considered to be related to bmax, the maximum value of the impact parameter that allows reaction to occur, by: σ r = P r π b max 2 is the reaction probability.

item.alttext: σ r = P r π b max 2
